mapper.select: SELECT apiId,sum(totleCost) currMonthConsume FROM qyfinance.ApiCostDayCount WHERE consuTime >= #{currMonthTime} GROUP BY apiId

SELECT apiId,count(b.id) currDayUserCount FROM qydata.ApiRequestLog a LEFT JOIN qydata.ApiResponseLog b ON a.id = b.requestLogId WHERE b.ok=1 AND b.isMock=0 AND b.createTime >= #{currDayTime} GROUP BY a.apiId

SELECT apiId,count(b.id) currDayFeeCount,sum(b.cost) currDayConsume FROM qydata.ApiRequestLog a LEFT JOIN qydata.ApiResponseLog b ON a.id = b.requestLogId WHERE b.ok = 1 AND b.isMock = 0 AND b.cost > 0 AND b.createTime >= #{currDayTime} GROUP BY a.apiId
SELECT a.apiId,sum(a.totleCost) lastWeekConsume FROM qyfinance.ApiCostDayCount a WHERE DATE_FORMAT(a.consuTime,'%x-%v')=DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(sysdate(),interval 1 week),'%x-%v') GROUP BY a.apiId
SELECT a.apiId,sum(a.totleCost) lastMonthConsume FROM qyfinance.ApiCostDayCount a WHERE DATE_FORMAT(a.consuTime,'%Y-%m')=DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(sysdate(),interval 1 week),'%Y-%m') GROUP BY a.apiId
SELECT distinct(a.apiTypeId) id,b.name FROM qyfinance.bkvwApi a LEFT JOIN qyfinance.bkvwApiType b ON a.apiTypeId=b.id
